item.title:
Take weekly (/daily/monthly) straddles / verticals / butterflies (ATM straddles are simplest as they’re closest to trading pure vol) and from ts1 -> ts2 calculate the return.
This could be 7 days before exp. to exp for weeklies.
Then assemble these returns into a series, a time series as one would call it.
You now have a return series like any other asset and can run any sort of strategies you’d run on other linear stuff.
